title: The Cigar Authority meets the Cigar Snob!
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority meets the Cigar Snob!
description: Today on The Cigar Authority Dave Garofalo, Mr Jonathan and Chuck Morrison welcome Erik Calvino, Publisher & Editor of "Cigar Snob," to discuss the journey and success of his enticing magazine. Also on today's show, the boys take you back in time to look at "This Date in History," talk about a guy getting sued for smoking in his OWN house, and reveal the best & worst places to live in the U.S. We're smoking the pre-released Garofalo Maduro, and the La Aurora Maduro. It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
